title: JDM wheel sales and support
description:
Looking for someone who knows about JDM wheels and specifications such as offset, width, diameter, popular models, etc. Your job will be to look through auctions and post them to my Instagram story every day. You'll be paid hourly and may receive a commission on every sale you bring in, up to $200 USD per sale.



You must have some knowledge of JDM wheels, as I can't teach you everything from scratch.



You will also be responsible for replying to customers about order status and for some basic Excel work. 



Typically i sell 7-10 sets of wheels a month. If you increase this number, you will receive a bonus of up to $500 per month as long as sales remain high.

title: QA Engineer (Manual + Automation)
description:
And Studio + LIVE AI

About the Role



We‚Äôre looking for a QA Engineer to help us ensure high-quality releases across multiple web apps and AI-powered SaaS platforms. You‚Äôll own QA execution (manual and automation), improve testing processes, and collaborate closely with our Project Manager and developers to prevent regressions and ship confidently.



This role is ideal if you enjoy a fast-moving environment, clear ownership, and building better systems‚Äînot just clicking through checklists.



What You‚Äôll Work On



Performing manual QA across web applications (feature testing, regression testing, cross-browser testing)

Creating and maintaining test plans, test cases, and QA checklists in ClickUp

Writing clear, actionable bug reports with steps to reproduce, expected vs actual results, screenshots/video, and environment details

Collaborating with devs to validate fixes and ensure issues are truly resolved (including re-tests + regression checks)

Supporting release cycles by verifying ‚Äúready for deploy‚Äù criteria and post-deploy smoke tests

Helping us improve QA workflows and documentation (SOPs, definitions of done, acceptance criteria templates)

Automation QA (Strongly Preferred)

If you have automation experience, you‚Äôll also help with:

Building and maintaining automated test suites (end-to-end and/or integration tests)

Setting up a practical automation approach that matches our stack and shipping speed

Running automated checks in CI when possible and keeping the suite stable and useful

(Nice) Reviewing or validating code changes from a QA perspective (risk spotting, edge cases)

Typical Projects You‚Äôll Touch

AI knowledge bases and chatbot experiences

Client marketing websites + landing pages

Multi-tenant SaaS platforms

Integrations and workflows (e.g., CRMs, forms,
 sequences, automation tools)

Tools / Environment

ClickUp (task management, acceptance criteria, QA tracking)

GitHub (PRs, issues, collaboration)

Common web stack: React / Next.js, APIs, databases (varies by project)

Automation tools may include (depending on your experience): Playwright, Cypress, Selenium, or similar

(If you have a preferred automation stack, tell us what you‚Äôd use and why.)



Requirements

2+ years experience in QA testing for web applications (manual required)

Strong ability to write clear bug reports and communicate professionally async

Comfortable validating work against acceptance criteria and spotting edge cases

Organized and consistent: you keep test artifacts clean, updated, and reusable

High ownership: you follow issues through from discovery ? fix validation ? release confidence

Nice to Have

Automation QA experience (end-to-end tests, regression suites, CI runs)

Ability to inspect logs/network requests and do basic debugging

Familiarity with modern web apps (React/Next.js), APIs, and databases

Experience working with SaaS products, multi-tenant apps, or AI features

Experience collaborating with distributed teams across time zones

Reporting / Collaboration

You‚Äôll work closely with our Project Manager / QA Lead (Micaella)

You‚Äôll collaborate with developers daily to validate fixes and prevent rework

You‚Äôll help us level up our quality systems‚Äînot just test outcomes





About Us

And Studio is a fast-growing digital agency and AI SaaS company, founded in 2014 with the vision of embracing possibilities and big dreams. Our name reflects our philosophy: we are all about "Yes AND Both."

Our core values are rooted in Christian principles:

Start Small, Dream Big

Living ---------- (Integrity & authenticity)

Prioritize People Over Projects

Make it Count

Find a Way & TEA (Test Every Assumption)

Unity, Speed, Ownership, Passion, Grace/Flexibility, Generosity

Engagement Details

Contract role: ~35‚Äì40 hours/week (flexible depending on fit and workload)

Remote ‚Äî async-friendly with some overlap for check-ins

Competitive rate based on experience

Potential for long-term engagement based on performance and team needs



How to Apply

Send your application with:



Subject line: I Want to Work at And Studio - QA Engineer - [Your Full Name]

Include:



Brief intro (2‚Äì3 sentences max): why you want the role + why you‚Äôre a fit) - Video

Link to LinkedIn and/or portfolio (if applicable)

If you have automation experience: link to GitHub or examples of test work

Your availability (hours/week, timezone)

Hourly rate expectations

Short intro video about you and your QA experience

 to:  

 If selected, a short Google Meet video call will be required.

title: Frontend Designer & Logo Designer
description:
Frontend Designer & Logo Designer



We are on the lookout for a talented Frontend Designer & Logo Designer with a strong ability to think strategically and execute visually. If you have a passion for building brands from the ground up‚Äîcombining positioning, messaging, and design into cohesive systems‚Äîwe‚Äôd love to meet you! Design brand and marketing assets for digital platforms (websites, landing pages, presentations, social media).



Collaborate with internal teams to ensure strategic and visual consistency across all touchpoints.



Support project management efforts and ensure timely delivery of brand and design projects.



Present brand concepts and design directions clearly to internal teams and clients.

Strong understanding of branding, visual systems, and storytelling.



Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.



Keen attention to detail.



Strong design and front-end visual sensibility.



Familiarity with web design, UI/UX principles, and digital-first branding is a plus.

Strong project management skills and the ability to work as part of a team.

Living
 We value integrity and authenticity in every aspect of life.

Shipping features from database schema to polished UI



Tech Stack

Frontend: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS

Backend: Supabase (PostgreSQL, Auth, Storage, Edge Functions)

Automation: n8n for workflow orchestration and API routes

Integrations: Square, Stripe, AI/LLM APIs

Tools: GitHub, ClickUp, Vercel



Requirements

2+ years experience with React/Next.js and TypeScript

Solid understanding of PostgreSQL and relational database design

Experience with Supabase, Firebase, or similar BaaS platforms

Comfortable working across the full stack (frontend and backend)

Strong communication skills and ability to work async with a distributed team

Self-directed with good judgment on when to ask for help



Nice to Have

Experience with n8n or similar workflow automation tools

Familiarity with AI/LLM integrations (RAG, embeddings, vector search)

Multi-tenant SaaS architecture experience

Background in church tech, ministry tools, or faith-based organizations

Experience with Square, Stripe, or POS integrations



About Us

And Studio is a fast-growing digital agency and AI SaaS company, founded in 2014 with the vision of embracing possibilities and big dreams. Our name reflects our philosophy: we are all about "Yes AND Both."

Our core values are rooted in Christian principles:

Start Small, Dream Big: We believe in the power of small beginnings leading to great achievements.

Living
 We value integrity and authenticity in every aspect of life.

Prioritize People Over Projects: We cherish people and their contributions above all else.

Make it Count: We focus on what truly matters.

Find a Way & TEA (Test Every Assumption): We believe in persistence and continuous improvement.

Unity, Speed, Ownership, Passion, Grace/Flexibility, Generosity



Engagement Details

Contract role: 35-40 hours/week

Remote ‚Äî async-friendly with some overlap for standups

Competitive rate based on experience

Potential for bonuses, raises, and long-term engagement



How to Apply



Send your application with:

Subject line: "I Want to Work at And Studio - Full Stack Developer - [Your Full Name]"

Brief intro (2-3 sentences max): Why you want this position and why you're a good fit. Keep it concise‚Äîlonger introductions will be skipped.

Link to GitHub or portfolio showing relevant work

Your availability (hours/week, timezone)

Hourly rate expectations

Short intro video about you and your experience

 to: 
 & 

If selected, a short Google Meet video call will be required.

title: Welcome to K-POP Universe : Office Admin Role for E-Commerce ! Join the Beat !
description:
- Recruitment validity period: Until 3 business days from the date of the first recruitment announcement

- A PH VA team of more than 5 people has already been formed, and business collaboration is possible using Tagalog in a comfortable atmosphere.

- Providing educational tutorial videos and operating a mentorship program to help new comers quickly adapt



[About Us]

* Company Introduction (Video):

youtu.be/dO2mWWZANx8



[Join Summitree and Write Your K-POP Legacy Alongside Filipinos]

Summitree envisions leveraging their Filipino employees' intelligence and English fluency to expand globally while sharing their passion for K-POP. They highlight the Philippines' crucial role in their expansion plans, emphasizing collaboration with their Filipino team to make a mark in the K-POP world. Joining Summitree means joining a multicultural team (Korea, Philippines, Mongolia, Others) with a shared goal of making K-POP history.



[Responsibilities]

We are looking for a ‚ÄúFull-Time‚Äù Office Admin to handle our business.

You will be doing a variety of tasks, almost all of which we will create tutorials for you.

1. Order fulfillment and shipping label generation

You will be responsible for gathering and processing customer orders accurately and efficiently. This includes coordinating with third-party logistics (3PL) providers for inbound and outbound shipments to ensure smooth operations.

2. Product listing and scheduling

As a distributor of K-POP records and merchandise, you will be involved in registering new products into our system. This includes managing inventory, updating product information, and ensuring accurate data entry. Additionally, you will be responsible for scheduling release dates and managing timelines using tools like Google Calendar.

3. Sales & Marketing

You will be responsible for studying and trying how to gain traffics to our shopping mall. Active working on research articles related to SEO, social marketing and finding where and how to promote our shopping mall is required.

4. Customer service support

providing excellent customer service is crucial to us. You will be responsible for addressing customer inquiries, resolving issues, and ensuring customer satisfaction. Your communication skills and problem-solving abilities will play a vital role in maintaining strong relationships with our valued customers.



[Required qualifications & skillset (must have)]

* Excellent written and verbal English communication skills

* Experience in puchasing K-POP Album or knowledge of K-POP related products (album, merchandise)

* Idea of how to promote K-POP albums and gain traffics in our shopping mall in PH online K-POP community for each artists



[Desired qualifications & skillset (nice to have)]

* Experience in handling customer service

* Experience in Photoshop

* Experience in
 Ads or Google Ads

* Knowledge and Experience of Microsoft Excel & Familar with Using Various Formula

* Experience in experience in Amazon Business (Familiar with Interface and function) or other E-commerce Platform



[Compensation & Employment Terms]

* ONLY Looking for a full time employee

* $300~$400/mo. determined based on the candidate‚Äôs skills, experience, and overall evaluation relative to other applicants

* One-year renewable Contract

- Compensation and terms may be adjusted based on attendance, teamwork, and performance.

- Exceptional performers may be considered for early renewal or adjustment. (multiple successful cases)

* 6-month probationary period with possibility of early conversion to regular position based on performance (multiple successful cases)



[Perks & Benefits]

1. Regular Employee Benefits

- 13th Month Salary provided

- 10 additional paid leave days upon regularization

2. Birthday Benefit (After 6 Months of Employment)

- Receive one free K-POP album of your favorite artist on your birthday

3. Paid Holidays (Regardless of Employment Status)

- January 1st (New Year‚Äôs Day) and Christmas Day are paid holidays

- Applies to both probationary and regular employees

4. Performance-Based Incentives

- Additional incentives may be provided during high-performance sales periods

(Example: major comeback seasons for artists such as BTS or Stray Kids)

5. Long Service Incentive Program

- 1-Year Service / 3-Year Service / 5-Year Service



[How To Apply for the job]

Just Fill out 10 Simple Questions through Google Form






Interview via google meet will be conducted after first screening and candidates will be notifed to their
s or
 



Thank you



Human Resource Dept.

Summitree

title: Meta Ads Specialist
description:
About the Role

We‚Äôre looking for a highly capable Senior Meta Ads Specialist to take ownership of paid social performance across a portfolio of client accounts.



You‚Äôll manage campaigns in Meta Ads Manager 
 & Instagram), analyse results, and continuously test and optimise to improve outcomes such as leads, revenue, and profitable growth. This role suits someone who enjoys working hands-on in the ad account, understands how to scale responsibly, and can communicate performance clearly and confidently.



This is a part-time contractor role with flexibility and autonomy. You‚Äôll be trusted to manage your workload independently and deliver results without micromanagement.



What You‚Äôll Do

- Plan, launch, and optimise campaigns in Meta Ads Manager 
 & Instagram)

- Build clear campaign structures (audiences, placements, budget allocation, testing frameworks)

- Improve CPA/ROAS through ongoing optimisation and structured experimentation

- Analyse performance data and identify growth opportunities

- Develop and maintain testing roadmaps (creative, audiences, offers, landing page alignment)

- Monitor budget pacing and scaling decisions

- Collaborate with creative teams and provide clear creative direction and feedback

- Ensure tracking and attribution are accurate

- Deliver clear monthly reporting and concise weekly updates with actionable insights

- Support broader social execution where required (e.g., coordinating creative requirements or light scheduling)



What You‚Äôll Bring

- 6+ years‚Äô experience managing Meta Ads campaigns end-to-end

- Proven success running performance campaigns (lead gen and/or eCommerce)

- Strong understanding of targeting, optimisation, and scaling strategies

- Confident interpreting data and making commercial decisions

- Comfortable managing multiple accounts at once

- Excellent written communication and clear reporting style

- Proactive, organised, and self-directed working style



Nice to Have

- Experience across both B2B lead generation and eCommerce

- Familiarity with tracking tools and attribution concepts

- Experience collaborating with designers and copywriters

- Understanding of landing page optimisation / CRO basics

- Experience with scheduling tools (helpful, not required)



What Success Looks Like

- Consistent, active optimisation across accounts

- Stable or improving CPA/ROAS performance

- Structured testing and sensible scaling decisions

- Clear communication with practical, actionable insights

- Reliable reporting and strong account hygiene



Why This Role Appeals

- Flexible part-time hours

- Remote work with minimal meetings

- High trust and autonomy

- Opportunity to work across a variety of client accounts

- Long-term potential for the right person



If you‚Äôre an experienced Meta Ads specialist who enjoys improving performance, spotting patterns in data, and taking ownership of outcomes, we‚Äôd love to hear from you.

title: Affiliate Manager
description:
Job Description:



Full-Time | Work From Home | Ecommerce & Influencer Partnerships



SRI Labs is a fast-growing, premium beauty & wellness ecommerce brand known for high-end skincare, hair tools, and breakthrough consumer products. We‚Äôre looking for a driven, organized, and relationship-focused Affiliate Manager to lead and scale our affiliate program across platforms like ShopMy, Levanta, and key influencer networks.



If you love partnering with creators, optimizing affiliate performance, and helping a brand grow through relationships ‚Äî this is the role for you.



What You‚Äôll Do



As our Affiliate Manager, you will own the entire affiliate ecosystem and work directly with the CEO and marketing leadership team to scale creator-led revenue.



Key Responsibilities



Manage and optimize SRI Labs‚Äô affiliate program across ShopMy, Levanta, and other affiliate platforms.

Recruit, vet, and onboard new affiliates, creators, and influencers that align with our brand.

Build strong long-term relationships with partners to drive consistent revenue and brand growth.

Track performance, payouts, ROI, and ensure all affiliates are supported with assets, codes, and campaigns.

Coordinate affiliate-driven launches, seasonal promotions, and strategic campaigns.

Identify top performers and build incentive strategies to maximize their output.

Maintain reporting dashboards and communicate results to leadership weekly.

Collaborate with internal marketing, product, design, and operations teams to support affiliate needs.

Continuously test new platforms, creators, strategies, and incentives to grow revenue.

Who You Are



We‚Äôre looking for someone who is:



Based in the Philippines

Experienced in affiliate, influencer marketing, or digital partnerships (1‚Äì3+ years preferred).

Organized, reliable, and able to manage many creators and campaigns at once.

Strong at relationship-building ‚Äî someone affiliates love to work with.

Comfortable working within platforms like ShopMy, Levanta, Impact, or similar tools.

Data-driven with excellent follow-through and communication skills.

Hungry, proactive, and passionate about helping a brand grow.

Why Join SRI Labs?



Remote work

Work directly with a high-performing founding team

Competitive salary based on experience

Long-term growth potential within a fast-scaling ecommerce company

Supportive, positive culture built around speed, innovation, and passion for great products

Opportunity to make a big impact ‚Äî your work will directly drive revenue and brand expansion

How to Apply



 your resume and a quick 2‚Äì3 sentence introduction 



Subject Line: Affiliate Manager ‚Äì [Your Name]



Include:



Links to affiliate programs or creators you‚Äôve worked with

Any relevant platforms/tools you‚Äôve used

Your expected monthly salary (in PHP)

Job Type: Full-time

title: Cold-Calling Appointment Setter ‚Äì Australian Trade Businesses IMMEDIATE START
description:
Job Title: Cold-Calling Appointment Setter ‚Äì Australian Trade Businesses



Job Type: Remote / Performance-Based



About Us: We help Australian trade businesses (plumbers, electricians, builders, carpenters, and more) grow by generating high-quality, qualified leads and converting them into paying clients. We‚Äôre looking for a motivated cold-calling appointment setter based in the Philippines to contact Australian businesses and schedule qualified appointments for our sales team.



Role Overview:

As a Cold-Calling Appointment Setter, you will:

Make outbound cold calls to Australian trade businesses during Australian business hours (8:30?AM ‚Äì 5:00?PM AEST / 6:30?AM ‚Äì 3:00?PM PHT).

Prospect and qualify businesses to ensure they are decision-makers and suitable clients.

Schedule appointments for the sales team ‚Äî target: 40 booked appointments per month.

Follow up to confirm appointments and maintain accurate CRM records.

Maintain high-quality standards ‚Äî only qualified appointments count for payment.



Requirements:

Excellent English communication skills (spoken English must be clear and professional for Australian clients).

Confident, persuasive, and resilient to cold-call rejection.

Experience in cold calling, appointment setting, or B2B sales preferred.

Must be able to work Australian business hours (8:30?AM ‚Äì 5:00?PM AEST / 6:30?AM ‚Äì 3:00?PM PHT).

Understanding of Australian business culture is a plus.

Self-motivated, results-driven, and comfortable with a performance-based pay structure.



Compensation:

$15 AUD per booked appointment (must be a qualified prospect and show up).

$25 AUD bonus if the appointment converts into a paying client.

Performance-based payouts fortnightly.



Earnings are uncapped ‚Äî top performers can earn significantly more.



Example potential monthly earnings (high performer):

40 booked appointments/month ? $600 AUD

15 of those convert ? $375 AUD bonus

Total monthly: $975 AUD (with potential to earn more as performance increases)



Why Join Us:

Work remotely from anywhere in the Philippines.

Flexible schedule aligned with Australian business hours.

High earning potential based purely on performance.

Training provided for prospecting, qualifying, and scheduling appointments with Australian trade businesses.

etings during EST hours

description:

We are seeking a dynamic and strategic Content Creator and Social Media Manager to oversee and enhance our Tik Tok and Instragram presence across various platforms. This role is crucial in building brand awareness, engaging with our audience, and driving traffic and conversions through creative and compelling content. As the Social Media Manager, you will be managing our Tik Tok, Tik Tok Shop, and Instagram. Creative mindset with a strong eye for design and multimedia trends.

title: Content Strategist / Head of Creative Strategy
description:
About the Company

We are a fast-growing AI-powered content creation agency helping brands build authority and generate leads through high-quality video content. We're a fully remote team on a mission to scale from the ground up, and we're looking for sharp, driven people to grow with us.

The Role

This is one of our most critical hires. As our Content Strategist, you will be the creative brain behind every piece of content we produce for clients. You'll sit between the client, our Project Manager, and our production team ‚Äî translating client goals into content strategies, hooks, angles, and briefs that actually drive results. You're not just an ideas person; you understand what content performs, why it performs, and how to replicate it at scale.

Key Responsibilities

‚Ä¢ Develop content strategies and creative briefs for all client accounts

‚Ä¢ Research and define winning hooks, angles, and messaging frameworks for each client niche

‚Ä¢ Collaborate closely with the PM and video editing team to ensure creative vision is executed correctly

‚Ä¢ Analyse client content performance and continuously iterate strategies based on data

‚Ä¢ Stay ahead of trends on YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, and LinkedIn to identify what's working

‚Ä¢ Help position our agency's content offer with clear, compelling strategy decks

‚Ä¢ Ensure every piece of content we produce ties back to client business goals

Requirements

‚Ä¢ 3+ years of experience in content strategy, social media strategy, or creative direction

‚Ä¢ Deep understanding of short-form and long-form video content performance

‚Ä¢ Experience working with brands or clients across multiple niches

‚Ä¢ Strong written communication ‚Äî you can write sharp, punchy briefs and hooks

‚Ä¢ Comfortable using AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude, Jasper, etc.) to accelerate creative output

‚Ä¢ Highly organized and able to manage multiple clients simultaneously

‚Ä¢ Experience with platforms like YouTube, LinkedIn, Instagram, or TikTok content strategy is a must

‚Ä¢ Portfolio or case studies of content strategies you've created

Nice to Have

‚Ä¢ Experience at a content or creative agency

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with tools like Notion, Airtable, or ClickUp

‚Ä¢ Knowledge of SEO and its relationship to content strategy

Compensation & Growth

Competitive monthly salary based on experience. This is a full-time, long-term remote role with room to grow into a leadership position as the company scales.

title: Sales Development Representative (SDR)
description:
About the Company

We are a fast-growing AI-powered content creation agency helping brands grow through strategic video content. We're building out our sales engine and need a driven SDR to help fill our pipeline and book qualified calls for our sales closer.

The Role

As our SDR, you are the first point of human contact for our prospects. Your job is to take warm leads from our outreach team, follow up persistently and professionally, handle early objections, and book qualified discovery calls for our sales closer. You're not cold-calling from scratch ‚Äî our outreach team generates interest, and you convert that interest into booked meetings.

Key Responsibilities

‚Ä¢ Follow up with warm leads generated by the outreach team via
, DMs, and WhatsApp

‚Ä¢ Qualify leads based on our ideal client profile before booking them for a closing call

‚Ä¢ Book and confirm discovery calls in our closer's calendar

‚Ä¢ Track all lead activity and update our CRM accurately and consistently

‚Ä¢ Send personalized follow-up sequences to leads who haven't responded

‚Ä¢ Work closely with our CRO and outreach team lead to refine messaging

‚Ä¢ Report daily on lead status, call-booked numbers, and conversion rates

Requirements

‚Ä¢ 1‚Äì3 years of experience in sales, lead qualification, or appointment setting

‚Ä¢ Excellent written and spoken English

‚Ä¢ Experience using a CRM (GoHighLevel, HubSpot, Pipedrive, etc.)

‚Ä¢ Persistent, organized, and comfortable with high-volume follow-up

‚Ä¢ Understanding of the B2B sales process

‚Ä¢ Self-motivated with the ability to work independently in a remote environment

‚Ä¢ Strong attention to detail ‚Äî you never let a lead fall through the cracks

Nice to Have

‚Ä¢ Experience in the marketing, media, or content agency space

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with cold outreach tools (Instantly, Lemlist, Apollo)

‚Ä¢ Experience working for a US, UK, or Australian-based company

Compensation & Growth

Base monthly salary + performance bonus for every qualified call booked. This is a full-time remote role with a clear path to a senior sales or account management role.

How to Apply

Send your application with the subject line: 'SDR Application ‚Äì [Your Name]'. Include your resume, a short voice or video introduction (1‚Äì2 minutes), and your top result from a previous sales or outreach role

title: Senior Finance & Accounting Manager
description:
We are looking for a Senior Finance & Accounting Manager to lead our accounting and financial reporting function. This role will be responsible for ensuring accurate financial reporting, supporting forecasting and budgeting, and partnering with leadership on financial strategy.



This position will manage an existing accounting tea
mber and play a key role in strengthening accounting processes as the company continues to grow‚Äîparticularly within an ecommerce environment powered by Shopify and with the launch of a new line of business.



Key Responsibilities:

* Oversee day-to-day accounting operations, including month-end and year-end close

* Review and ensure accuracy of financial statements and internal financial reports

* Lead budgeting, forecasting, and cash flow analysis

* Analyze and reconcile Shopify financial data, including revenue, refunds, fees, chargebacks, and payouts

* Partner with operations and leadership to translate Shopify reporting and ecommerce performance metrics into financial insights

* Support the launch of a new line of business, including setting up and structuring the QuickBooks chart of accounts

* Integrate the new line of business into financial reporting, tracking, and performance analysis

* Manage and mentor accounting staff, ensuring high-quality and timely work

* Ensure compliance with accounting standards and internal controls

* Provide financial insights and recommendations to support leadership decision-making

* Continuously improve accounting processes, reporting efficiency, and ecommerce-related financial workflows



Qualifications:

* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field

* 5‚Äì10+ years of progressive accounting and finance experience

* Strong background in financial reporting, forecasting, and cash flow management

* Hands-on experience with Shopify reporting and ecommerce financial analytics

* Experience setting up or restructuring charts of accounts in QuickBooks or similar systems

* Experience managing or reviewing the work of other accountants

* Strong attention to detail with excellent analytical and problem-solving skills

* Excellent written and verbal English communication skills

* Experience working with U.S.-based companies is a plus





Compensation & Details: 

* USD $15,000‚Äì$20,000 annually

* Full-time, remote position

* Long-term opportunity with growth potential

title: Google Ads & SEO Specialist
description:
About the Role

We‚Äôre looking for a genuinely experienced Google Ads & SEO Specialist to take ownership of search performance across a portfolio of client accounts.



This role sits at the intersection of paid and organic search. You‚Äôll lead Google Ads strategy and optimisation while also guiding SEO direction ‚Äî identifying opportunities, prioritising work, and ensuring search visibility and lead generation improve over time.



You won‚Äôt be micromanaged, and you won‚Äôt be handed step-by-step instructions. We‚Äôre looking for someone senior enough to assess, decide, and act ‚Äî someone who understands why performance changes and knows how to respond quickly and logically.



This is a part-time contractor role suited to a specialist who prefers focused, meaningful work over high-volume task execution.



What You‚Äôll Do



Google Ads 

- Manage and optimise Search, Performance Max, and remarketing campaigns

- Improve lead quality, conversion rates, and cost efficiency

- Review keyword targeting, match types, negatives, and bidding strategies

- Identify wasted spend and scaling opportunities

- Develop and run structured testing plans

- Ensure conversion tracking and attribution are reliable



SEO (Strategic & Hands-On)

- Conduct technical and on-page SEO audits

- Identify ranking opportunities and prioritise actions

- Create SEO roadmaps and implementation plans

- Review site structure, internal linking, and metadata

- Collaborate with developers and content teams where required

- Reporting & Communication

- Provide clear monthly performance reporting with insights and next steps

- Share concise updates on progress, risks, and opportunities

- Translate performance data into plain-English business impact

- Offer proactive recommendations rather than reactive reporting



What You‚Äôll Bring

- 6+ years‚Äô experience managing Google Ads and SEO end-to-end

- Deep understanding of search intent, keyword strategy, and conversion optimisation

- Proven ability to improve lead generation or revenue outcomes

- Strong analytical skills and confident decision-making

- Experience working independently and managing priorities

- Excellent written communication and structured reporting

- Ability to collaborate with developers, marketers, and stakeholders



Nice to Have

- Experience with B2B lead generation or service-based businesses

- Familiarity with GA4, GTM, and Looker Studio reporting

- Experience reviewing landing pages and conversion pathways

- Understanding of technical SEO and site performance factors



What Success Looks Like

- Improved lead quality and cost efficiency in Google Ads

- Measurable gains in organic visibility and search performance

- Clear, reliable reporting and communication

- Proactive identification of issues and opportunities

- Well-structured, well-maintained accounts and search strategies



Why This Role Appeals

- Flexible part-time hours

- Remote work 

- High trust and autonomy

- Opportunity to make meaningful impact across multiple accounts

- Long-term potential for the right specialist



If you‚Äôre a senior search specialist who enjoys analysing performance, improving outcomes, and owning results, we‚Äôd love to hear from you.

title: Hospitality Operations Manager - Remote (Short-Term Rental & Wedding Venue)
description:
About the Role

We run a US-based luxury hospitality portfolio ‚Äî currently 3‚Äì6 short-term rental properties and a boutique micro-wedding venue. We're looking for an Operations Manager, not a Virtual Assistant.

We run a modern, tech-forward operation ‚Äî we use a lot of tools, build custom systems, and lean on AI to work smarter. You don't need to be an engineer, but you do need to be the kind of person who picks up new software quickly and genuinely enjoys finding better ways to do things.

This role is the "Control Tower" of our business. You will own logistics, guest experience, wedding sales, and brand marketing simultaneously ‚Äî solving problems, spending company money when needed, and making judgment calls without waiting on the owner. If you need to be told what to do every hour, this is not the right fit. If you thrive with real ownership and a direct line to leadership, keep reading.



What You'll Own

1. Logistics & Procurement

You are responsible for ensuring our properties never run out of supplies. You'll manage inventory across all locations, use the company card to reorder linens, toiletries, and consumables proactively, and maintain accurate stock logs. You own this ‚Äî not us.

Cleaner & Contractor Oversight: You are the direct supervisor for our cleaning teams. You'll set schedules, review photo quality reports after each turnover, and approve payments. If something breaks ‚Äî a heater, a lock, an appliance ‚Äî you troubleshoot with the guest, source and hire a local contractor, authorize payment, and then notify the owner once it's resolved.

2. Wedding Venue Sales & Coordination

Our systems are set up to help you respond to inbound wedding inquiries within 5 minutes during your shift ‚Äî and that standard is non-negotiable. You'll answer questions about pricing, capacity, and availability with a warm, white-glove tone that matches the caliber of our venue. You'll qualify leads, schedule on-site tours, and keep our CRM (HoneyBook/Dubsado) clean and up to date so no lead falls through the cracks.

3. Guest Experience ‚Äî Short-Term Rentals

Own all guest communication from inquiry to checkout across Airbnb and VRBO. Handle escalations, disputes with platform support, and craft professional responses to reviews ‚Äî both positive and negative.

4. Content & Marketing 

This is a real part of the job, not an afterthought. You'll be responsible for:

- Social media posting and scheduling across Instagram,
, and TikTok using our content calendar and tools (e.g., Later, Buffer, or similar)

- Marketing
 execution ‚Äî sending pre-written or lightly templated campaigns to our lead lists via our
 platform (e.g., Mailchimp, Klaviyo, or similar)

- Keeping our pipeline warm ‚Äî following up with cold leads, past inquirers, and potential repeat guests using pre-approved messaging



You won't be writing strategy from scratch, but you need strong written English and an eye for what looks and sounds premium.



Requirements:



- 3+ years of experience in operations, property management, event coordination, or a hybrid hospitality/marketing role

- Must be available to work full-time, Monday‚ÄìFriday, 9:00 AM ‚Äì 5:00 PM CST (US Central Time) ‚Äî this is a hard requirement, no  exceptions

- Prior experience handling company expenses, purchasing, or petty cash ‚Äî you will be trusted with a company card

- Fluent English communication, both written and spoken ‚Äî you will be on calls with guests, wedding couples, and vendors regularly and must be able to represent the brand with confidence and warmth

- Solid working knowledge of Google Drive, Sheets, and Docs as a daily operating environment

- Comfortable with a tools-heavy workflow ‚Äî you'll use multiple platforms simultaneously and are expected to learn new software quickly, including tools that are custom-built for our operation

- At least passing familiarity with Slack, a CRM platform (HoneyBook, Dubsado, or similar), a social media scheduling tool (Later, Buffer, or similar), and Airbnb/VRBO host dashboards

- Open to using AI tools like ChatGPT or Claude as part of your day-to-day ‚Äî we'll show you how we use them, but curiosity beats credentials here

- High emotional intelligence ‚Äî you can de-escalate a frustrated guest and keep an anxious bride feeling taken care of, all in the same afternoon

- Strong written English with a warm, professional tone that reflects a premium brand

Platform experience with Ownerrez is a strong plus but not required ‚Äî we'll train the right person



Hardware Requirements: Reliable PC or Mac, 25 Mbps+ internet connection, Noise-canceling headset (required for guest and vendor calls)



Why This Role

Our last ops hire treated this like a task queue. We need someone who treats it like a business they co-own. As we add properties ‚Äî and we are actively acquiring ‚Äî your scope and compensation grow with us. This is a long-term career position with a direct relationship with the owner, not a seat in a call center.



How to Apply

Applications that don't follow these instructions will not be reviewed ‚Äî this is your first test of attention to detail.

Send an
 with the subject line: Hospitality Ops Manager ‚Äì [Your Name]

Include:

1. Your resume or portfolio link.

2. Written answers to both scenarios below:

Scenario A ‚Äî The Inventory Problem: You review a cleaner's post-checkout report and notice one of our properties has 2 rolls of toilet paper left. A guest checks in tomorrow. Next-day delivery isn't available and the owner is unreachable. What do you do, step by step?

Scenario B ‚Äî The Wedding Inquiry: A bride
s asking to tour the venue this Saturday at 2 PM. Your calendar shows a private event in progress at that time. Write the actual reply you'd send her ‚Äî it must decline that slot while keeping her warm and moving toward a booking.

title: Sr Email Marketing & Launch Copywriter
description:
About Us

We‚Äôre a fast-growing education company serving experienced software engineers who want real-world Rust skills and real career outcomes. Our flagship offers are mentor-led, cohort-based programs focused on shipping production-grade projects and landing Rust-heavy roles.



 is one of our main revenue channels. We use it to fill cohorts, book sales calls, and reactivate our warm audience. We‚Äôre hiring someone to own this function end-to-end.



Role Overview

You will own the strategy, copy, and execution of
 campaigns that drive launches, bookings, reactivations, and long-term revenue from our list. This is a senior, full-time role for someone who wants clear ownership, measurable impact, and a long-term seat on the team.



You are not ‚Äúwriting some
s.‚Äù You are building a repeatable
 machine that keeps our calendar full and our cohorts sold out.



What You‚Äôll Own

1.  Launch Campaigns (Cohorts & Fast-Cash Promos)

Plan and write complete launch sequences for our cohorts and promo offers (pre-launch, open cart, objections, FAQ, deadline, last call, sold-out, etc.).

Standardize, document, and templatize launches so they‚Äôre easy to clone and improve.



2. Evergreen Nurture & Segmentation

Build and maintain evergreen sequences that warm new subscribers and move them toward a call or application.

Segment based on behavior and stage (new leads, engaged, inactive, past applicants, buyers) so people get the right messages at the right time.



3. Show-Up & No-Show Sequences

Write and optimize sequences that increase show-up rates for booked calls.

Create follow-up for no-shows and no-buys to recover missed revenue and keep good leads in motion.



4. Reactivation Campaigns

Run quarterly reactivation campaigns for cold or inactive subscribers to generate ‚Äúfound‚Äù revenue from the list.



What Success Looks Like in the First 90 Days

- 3 complete launch sequences live, documented, and reusable.

- 1 evergreen nurture sequence live, for new leads.

- Show-up rate on
-sourced calls improved vs. baseline.

- At least 1 reactivation campaign shipped with clear revenue attribution.

- Clear
 playbook (templates, frameworks, naming) the team can understand and reuse.



Requirements

- 3+ years professional B2C
 copy experience.

- Proven track record owning full launch/email sequences (not just individual
s).

- Strong understanding of offer positioning, sequencing, and deadlines for high-ticket educational or coaching products.

- Ability to write in a clear, human voice that resonates with senior, technical audiences.

- Comfortable with at least 3-hour overlap with US pacific time zone, async with a distributed team, and being accountable to numbers (revenue, bookings, show rates).



Bonus

- Experience with technical or software developer audiences.

- Familiarity with platforms like Kartra, ActiveCampaign, or similar.

- Comfortable pulling basic numbers from dashboards/CRMs to see what‚Äôs working.



How to Apply

In your application, include:

- A brief personal intro (2‚Äì5 short sentences) in your own words.

- 1‚Äì2 examples of launch or promo sequences you‚Äôve written (cohort, course, or high-ticket offers).

- A short note explaining how you approach writing launch
s for a high-ticket cohort program.

- Your monthly salary expectation in USD (full-time) and your official
 address.



Application Question (Required):

1. Which part of the
 lifecycle do you enjoy owning most? (launches, nurture, reactivation, post-purchase, etc.) What
 platforms have you worked in?

2. Briefly describe one launch
 sequence you‚Äôve owned end-to-end.

3. In 5‚Äì7 bullet points, outline:

- the audience

- the goal of the sequence

- how you structured the sequence (early ? middle ? final
s)

- one decision you made to avoid audience fatigue



Applications that skip any of the above will not be considered.

title: Video Editor for Ecommerce Ads multi-languages
description:
Hello everyone,

We are a fast-growing e-commerce company looking for an experienced Video Editor and Translator to join our team. This is not a role for beginners. We need someone who already understands how to make high-converting e-commerce ads and can work fast without losing quality.



Your main task is to take our winning French video ads and localize (translate) them for the German, Dutch, English, Italian, and Spanish markets. These videos are typically 30 seconds to 1 minute 30 seconds long.



Key Responsibilities

High-Quality translation: Translate and adapt French ads into 5+ languages. The final result must look and sound professional. The translations must make perfect sense in the specific market. Might need to adjust some clips to match the market.



AI Tool Expert: You will use Claude or Gemini for smart translations and AI voice tools (like ElevenLabs) to create natural-sounding voiceovers.



Volume & Speed: We need you to deliver 5 to 10 high-quality videos per day. Since the creative is already done, you just need to swap the language and audio efficiently.



Autonomous Problem Solving: You must be autonomous, If you don't fully understand a task, you should know how to use AI and your own research to find the solution and get the job done. We will also do our best to help you, you just need to be open to grow and smart.



Requirements

E-commerce Experience: You must have a portfolio or experience specifically in E-commerce video ads (Dropshipping, Brand ads, etc.).



Software Skills: Proficiency in video editing software (CapCut, Premiere Pro, etc.). We will provide access to Envato Elements and other premium tools if needed.



Eye for Detail: You ensure the text, timing, and audio are perfect in every language. It needs to "feel" right.



Growth Mindset: We are looking for someone motivated to learn our systems and move into higher roles and leadership positions as we scale.





Career Path: There is significant room to grow with us. We reward hard work and reliability with more responsibility and higher pay over time.



Support: We provide training on our specific workflow to help you reach your daily targets.

title: Design Team Lead
description:
About Bare:



At Bare, we're focused on bringing end-of-life planning into the digital age and, along the way, making a real impact on people at a time in their lives that really matters.



Since launching in 2019 we've grown exponentially. Bare started out as a direct-to-consumer funeral home offering a digitally enabled, low-cost funeral service. We've since expanded to become Australia's leading provider of prepaid funerals, online wills, online estate planning, and pet funerals. Our vision is to become the end-of-life CRM, supporting individuals and families to deal with a difficult topic in an empathic, affordable, and sustainable way.



The exciting part? The journey has only just started. We are backed by some of Australia's highest profile investors, are currently one of the fastest growing companies in Australia, and we're committed to making a difference. Join us on the ground and be intimately involved in the creation and development of a product and service that is category-leading.



What you can expect from us:

title: AI Agent Developer & Systems Integrator (GoHighLevel/GHL Expert)
description:
Company Overview

We operate two fast-paced automotive businesses in Fredericksburg, VA: My Car (independent used car dealership) and My Car Care (auto repair center). We are scaling our AI infrastructure and need a dedicated specialist to manage and optimize our AI communication agents.



Role Summary

We use a white-labeled GoHighLevel (GHL) platform called "All-in-One Marketing." We are looking for an expert who understands the GHL ecosystem to build and maintain high-performing Voice AI and Conversational (SMS/Chat) AI agents. Your goal is to ensure our automated systems are smarter, faster, and more effective at converting leads into appointments.



Key Responsibilities

Knowledge Base & Bot Training: Update and refine the training data specifically for My Car Care. You will ensure the agents have all necessary FAQs, shop procedures, and sales content to perform effectively across both voice and text.



System Integration: Link and integrate our sub-accounts (My Car and My Car Care) so the AI agents have real-time access to essential data, including leads, vehicle inventory, and customer history.



Voice & Text Optimization: Audit existing AI prompts and scripts for both voice and chat. We expect you to provide expert recommendations to improve flow, reduce latency in voice responses, and improve conversion rates.



Workflow Automation: Manage the backend GHL workflows to ensure the AI triggers correctly and data flows accurately between our DMS and CRM.



Required Skills & Experience

GoHighLevel (GHL) Mastery: Deep, hands-on experience with GHL sub-accounts, snapshots, and Conversation AI is a strict requirement.



Voice AI Expertise: Experience configuring and optimizing Voice AI agents (specifically within or integrated with GHL).



AI Development: Proven track record of training AI bots with custom knowledge bases to handle complex customer interactions.



Technical Integration: Experience using Zapier, Make, or native GHL tools to sync data across different business accounts.



Sales-Focused Mindset: Ability to write prompts that are designed to drive appointments and handle common automotive/repair objections.



Application Instructions

Please start your application with the phrase "GHL AI Expert Ready." In your cover letter, please briefly describe your experience specifically with Voice AI and how you have previously integrated multiple GHL sub-accounts.

title: Sales Representative
description:
Join a fast-growing US online home goods retailer and enjoy the learning and opportunities that you have while working with us.



We strive to provide 5-star service & shopping assistance to all of our clients, and all of our team is accountable to fulfill this.



We are looking for a Sales Representative who can assist prospective buyers and close online ecommerce sales.



We're only looking for full-time, long-term, ongoing cooperation.



Work schedules available:

8 AM to 4 PM US EST

4 PM to 12 AM US EST



Your work week will be 5 days per week, with 2 days off per week. Days off will be selected with your manager. We will try to accommodate your preferences for which days you like, based on availability.



This role starts ASAP.



Job Duties and Responsibilities:

Receive incoming phone calls and live chats from potential customers (prospects) who indicated that they need shopping assistance. This does not include calls and chats from existing customers that need help with their orders (that‚Äôs a job for a different department)

Makes follow-up calls, writes follow-up
s, and text messages to potential buyers. We try to follow up 5x with each person that contacted us (unless they indicate that they are no longer interested). We don‚Äôt do cold calling. Only reaching out to prospects who interacted with our online store and left their contact information.

After each interaction with a prospect/customer, writes notes & comments in our CRM (Asana)

Communicate efficiently and build rapport with potential customers

Assists prospects in their shopping journey and helps make the purchase decision

Ensures that all prospects‚Äô questions and objections are addressed

Leads every interaction to a close sale, which means an order is placed on our online store

Prepares custom quotes, price matches competitors if necessary, and offers custom discounts. This requires calculating margins & ensuring profitability.

Answering questions about the products we offer, including technical questions. Learns the specifications, features and benefits of our bestsellers. Over time, becomes an expert in the industry.

If not able to answer product-specific questions, conducts research in the materials provided by the supplier, or reaches out to the supplier to get the information

Confirms stock availability and lead times when offering products to prospects

Documents standard procedures and best practices in a written form, so that other tea
mbers can learn from them



Requirements:

At least 2 years of experience in sales on the phone

Experience must include both inbound and outbound sales

Excellent written and verbal English communication skills

Experience in Customer Service on the phone is a nice to have

Experience in the e-commerce (online shopping) industry is nice to have

Home improvement, construction, and gas plumbing industry experience is a plus

Outgoing, friendly, and lively

Can-do mindset, with a sense of ownership, pride in your performance, and its impact on the company‚Äôs success

Long-term commitment - treat this as your career



What we can offer:

Sales commission: 8% of gross profit from all orders closed. Gross profit means the sale amount minus the product and shipping costs. Paid monthly. No upper limit. Monthly commission payouts range between $1,200 (the guaranteed minimum) and as high as $3,000 (for the top performer). The average monthly payout is $1,465 (average from the last 2 years).

$1,200/month minimum guaranteed pay

15 days paid days off per year (also convertible to min. guaranteed commission)

Paid training on all aspects of the role

Opportunities for professional development

Friendly atmosphere

Online Interview process

Fully remote position

title: Cold Caller
description:
we have about 1500 Leads of skilled nursing facilities in three different states that you will be calling and selling a free dementia training grant to.



Your role is to

- Identify the administrator at the facility and retrieve their

- Get the Administrator to agree to getting the grant for their facility (*the grant is free so you will have a high hit-rate + we have a working script for you to use)



We will begin at $4/hr + any lead that converts (meaning: after you get them to agree, we will send them a contract and they sign) is a bonus $10.



Ex. if in a day, you get 20 facilities to agree and we send them the contract, but only 13 end up signing. Then for that day, you would get paid (4hrsx4 = 16 + 130 (13x$10)) = $146.



The dialer system we will use is PhoneBurner and your schedule would be 4 hours/day. In the hours of 9-11AM and 1-3PM Central Standard Time here in America. Monday - Friday.

- Maintain consistent month-over-month SEO and Ad improvements.



What We‚Äôre Looking For

- Market Experience: Preferably AU market experience (understanding Australian search intent).

Culture Fit

- Work Style & Culture Fit: We value initiative, ownership, and proactive communication. Team members take responsibility without needing managers to chase them. Team members are also expected to:

title: Senior Video Editor (AI-Powered UGC Ads Specialist)
description:
???? Senior Video Editor (AI-Powered UGC Ads Specialist)

???? About the Role



We‚Äôre looking for a highly skilled Senior Video Editor who specializes in creating high-converting, realistic UGC-style ads using both traditional editing and AI tools.



This is NOT a basic editing role.



You must understand:



Direct response marketing



Hook-driven ad structure



Performance metrics (CTR, CVR, CPA, hook rate, hold rate)



AI-powered creative workflows



If you know how to turn raw footage, AI avatars, and product images into ads that feel authentic and convert at scale ‚Äî we want you.



???? What You‚Äôll Be Responsible For



Editing high-converting UGC-style video ads (15s‚Äì90s)



Creating realistic AI-generated UGC using tools like:



ElevenLabs (voice cloning)



Runway



Arcads



Sora / text-to-video tools

Turning scripts into scroll-stopping Meta / TikTok ads



Creating:



Hook variations (3‚Äì5 per concept)



Multiple CTA endings



Split-test versions



Making ads look native, not ‚Äúcorporate‚Äù



Adding captions that boost retention (pattern interrupts, dynamic subtitles)



Creating product demo sequences from static images using AI motion tools



Improving pacing based on performance data



???? Required Skills

Deep understanding of:



Meta Ads



TikTok Ads



YouTube Shorts



Strong sense of pacing, retention, and storytelling



Experience creating realistic AI-generated UGC content



Ability to:

Sync AI voices naturally



Create product animations from still images



Advanced skills in:



Premiere Pro / Final Cut



After Effects



CapCut (for UGC style)



Strong understanding of ad compliance guidelines



???? Bonus Points If You:

Understand VSL-to-short-form adaptation



Know how to analyze ad metrics and iterate creatives



Can create 9:16, 1:1, and 4:5 variants efficiently



Have built AI-based creative workflows to scale ad production



???? What You‚Äôll Deliver Weekly



10‚Äì20 UGC-style ads per week



3‚Äì5 hook variations per concept



Product demo clips



AI-generated testimonial variations



Creative test batches for scaling



???? Mandatory Application Task (REQUIRED)



To be considered for this role, you must submit the following:



A written AI video generation prompt that you would use to create a realistic UGC-style video of:



A person speaking naturally in a modern kitchen



Explaining a simple weight-loss recipe using gelatin ingredients

Your prompt must demonstrate:



Natural speech cadence



Realistic lighting and camera framing



Authentic UGC-style delivery



Compliance-safe messaging (no extreme medical claims)



Clear direction for facial expressions, micro-movements, and hand gestures



Platform-ready framing (9:16 vertical preferred)



We are evaluating:



Your prompt structure



Your understanding of realism



Your ability to avoid obvious ‚ÄúAI look‚Äù



Your awareness of compliance in health marketing



Submissions without this prompt will not be reviewed.



???? Compensation



Competitive monthly salary (based on experience)



Performance bonuses based on winning creatives



Long-term opportunity with scaling brand



???? How to Apply



Send:



Portfolio (especially UGC-style ads)



3 best performing ads you‚Äôve created



List of AI tools you use regularly



Short Loom video (2‚Äì3 min) explaining your workflow



Your expected monthly salary



The required AI kitchen recipe prompt (see above)

title: DM Setter ‚Äì Paid 100 Message Qualification (Required Before Interview)
description:
Position Title:

DM Outreach Setter ‚Äì Performance-Based Role (Paid Qualification)



Compensation:

‚Ä¢ Qualification test: Paid flat $30 upon verified completion

‚Ä¢ Full role pay: $10‚Äì$14/hr (based on performance)

‚Ä¢ Performance bonuses available weekly

‚Ä¢ Paid weekly via Wise or PayPal



?



Overview



We are hiring disciplined outreach setters to message small U.S.-based junk removal and hauling businesses to book short introductory phone calls.



This is a performance-driven role.

To ensure we only move forward with serious candidates, we require a short paid qualification test before interview.



This protects both sides:

‚Ä¢ You prove execution ability

‚Ä¢ We prove we pay on time



?



???? Qualification Test (Required)



Before interview, you must:

 1. Select one U.S. metro region of your choice

 2. Identify 100 junk removal / hauling / cleanout businesses

 3. Log them in spreadsheet format (template provided below)

 4. Send 100 outreach messages using the exact script provided

 5. Provide screenshot proof of sent messages

 6. Submit spreadsheet + screenshots within 24 hours



This is a paid qualification test.



Only applicants who complete this will be considered for long-term placement.



?



???? Outreach Script (Use Exactly)



Message 1:



Hi ‚Äî quick question, are you the owner of [Business Name]?



If yes:



We help junk removal companies increase inbound job calls in their service area.

Would you be open to a short phone call this week to see if it makes sense?



That‚Äôs it.

Do not modify script.



?



???? Spreadsheet Format (Required Columns)



‚Ä¢ Business Name

‚Ä¢ City

‚Ä¢ Instagram or
 link

‚Ä¢ Date Messaged

‚Ä¢ Contact Status (No Reply / Replied / Interested)



?



???? Important Rules



‚Ä¢ No duplicate businesses

‚Ä¢ No fabricated entries

‚Ä¢ Screenshot proof required

‚Ä¢ Must be sent within 24 hours

‚Ä¢ Do not send links in first message

‚Ä¢ Professional tone only



Incomplete submissions will not be reviewed.



?



???? After Qualification



If your 100-message test is verified:



‚Ä¢ You will be moved into the 48-hour paid onboarding sprint

‚Ä¢ Daily requirement: 250 messages

‚Ä¢ Long-term role available for consistent performers



?



???? To Apply



Reply to this job post with:

 1. Your timezone

 2. Confirmation you can complete 100-message test within 24 hours

 3. ‚ÄúI understand this is a paid qualification before interview.‚Äù



Only complete submissions will be reviewed.

title: Medical Receptionist and Billing Coordinator
description:
We are seeking a high-energy, self-starting professional to manage our virtual front desk and support our billing operations. While we utilize an outside billing agency, this role is the critical link between our clinic, the patients, and our revenue cycle.



We are not looking for someone to simply answer phones; we need a proactive owner of the administrative process who ensures no detail is missed and every patient interaction is handled with urgency.



Key Responsibilities



Proactive Front Desk Management: Manage phone lines and video check-ins with high responsiveness, ensuring zero "dead air" and prompt patient service.



Revenue Cycle Support: Act as the primary liaison with our outside billing agency, ensuring they have accurate data and resolving claim denials or missing information.



Prior Authorizations & Eligibility: Independently manage the prior authorization process and perform rigorous insurance verification before appointments to prevent billing delays.



Credentialing Assistance: Maintain provider records and assist in the timely submission of credentialing applications and renewals.



Patient Financial Liaison: Clearly communicate co-pays, deductibles, and outstanding balances to patients, facilitating collections at the time of service.



Administrative Ownership: Handle all scanning, faxing, and EHR record-keeping with a high degree of accuracy and minimal supervision.



Qualifications & Requirements



The "Self-Starter" Mindset: Proven ability to work independently in a remote setting without "phoning it in." You are someone who looks for work when things are quiet.



Insurance & Billing Literacy: Solid understanding of ICD-10/CPT codes, prior authorizations, and the insurance appeals process.



Credentialing Knowledge: Familiarity with CAQH and the provider enrollment process is highly preferred.



Tech Savvy: Advanced proficiency in EMR (required) EPIC (preferred) and remote communication tools (Meet, Teams, Doxy).



High Responsiveness: Ability to maintain a "sense of urgency" in a virtual environment, responding to staff and patient needs in real-time.



Core Attributes for Success



Ownership: You treat the clinic‚Äôs schedule and billing health as if it were your own business.



Accuracy: You understand that a small error in insurance entry leads to a major delay in payment.



Persistence: You don‚Äôt stop at the first "no" from an insurance company; you follow through until the task is complete.

title: URGENT HIRING: Virtual Assistant - Administrator, IT and Accounting Xero Certified and have Australian Accounting
description:
You only get one chance: carefully follow these instructions before applying or you will not hear from us. To apply you must visit our webpage 
/job-opportunities/undergraduate-to-senior-accountant/



Company: Health and Life



Location: Remote (with own internet and office facilities)



Job Type: Contract (may go long term depending on performance)



About Us:

Health and Life Access is a well-established healthcare consulting Chartered Accounting firm organisation specialising in the management of service entities and organizations throughout Australia and overseas. We are committed to creating a sustainable and socially responsible healthcare system.



Job Description:

We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Virtual Assistant to provide administrative, IT, and accounting support to our organisation and clients. The successful candidate will report to the CEO and relevant supervisors, ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our business.



Key Responsibilities:

Provide administrative, IT, and accounting support to the CEO and other consultants/managers.

Maintain accurate records, perform bookkeeping, and handle client billing.

Assist with financial reporting, budgeting, and petty cash management.

Manage calendars, appointments, and correspondence.

Develop and maintain effective working relationships with staff, clients, and suppliers.

Identify and resolve problems promptly, providing potential solutions.

Participate in special projects and additional duties as required.



Requirements:

Xero Certified and have Australian Accounting experience preferred.

Proven experience in administration, IT, and accounting.

Proficiency in using Google Suite, Xero, FileMaker Pro, and other software as specified.

Strong organisational and communication skills.

Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

Commitment to maintaining confidentiality and adhering to ethical standards.

Ability to work under pressure and manage multiple tasks efficiently.



Working Conditions:

Standard 38-hour week, Monday to Friday, 8:30 am to 5:00 pm ACDT.

Flexible working hours may be required.

Must have own internet and office facilities.

No leave entitlement applies

All tasks are allocated by a Google calendar. The more you complete competently and within budget, the more work you generate.



Fees:

Task-based monthly fees up to $3,000 AUD or equivalent overseas currency. Long term contract positions available based on performance.



Fees reviewed based on performance; potential for multiple fee increases for good performance.



How to Apply:

If you are a motivated and detail-oriented individual with a passion for healthcare administration.



To apply visit our ‚ÄùUndergraduate up to senior accountant jobs‚Äù web page 
/job-opportunities/undergraduate-to-senior-accountant/.



Attention to detail matters, so read the application process carefully. You only get one chance.

title: RECRUITING VA ($10 per hr) READ FULL JOB POST
description:
Role Overview



We are hiring two Operations Managers to build and oversee structured outreach pods.



This is an enforcement-based execution role.

You are not a strategist. You are responsible for structure, speed, accountability, and daily performance control.



You will recruit, manage, and enforce standards for up to 10 DM setters in a defined outreach system.



?



Core Responsibilities



You are responsible for:



‚Ä¢ Recruiting and onboarding up to 10 DM setters

‚Ä¢ Enforcing daily outreach quotas

‚Ä¢ Removing underperformers the same day

‚Ä¢ Collecting and verifying daily proof of work

‚Ä¢ Submitting a standardized KPI summary report daily

‚Ä¢ Maintaining operational discipline within your pod



This is a performance-focused role with measurable daily metrics.



?



Authority



You will have full operational authority within your pod.



You are authorized to:



‚Ä¢ Remove setters the same day if they miss quota or proof requirements

‚Ä¢ Replace setters immediately without approval

‚Ä¢ Enforce the 4-hour proof-of-work rule

‚Ä¢ Make enforcement decisions without waiting for escalation



Speed and clarity are essential.



?



Performance Standards



‚Ä¢ Your pod must be fully staffed within 72 hours

‚Ä¢ You must maintain a minimum of 6 active setters daily

‚Ä¢ Any removed setter must be replaced within 24 hours

‚Ä¢ Daily KPI reporting is required in structured numeric format

‚Ä¢ Failure to maintain pod performance may result in replacement



This is a high-accountability environment with clear metrics.



?



Daily Reporting Format (Required)



Your end-of-day report must include:



‚Ä¢ Active setters

‚Ä¢ Total DMs sent

‚Ä¢ Replies

‚Ä¢ Booked calls

‚Ä¢ Shows

‚Ä¢ Closed deals

‚Ä¢ Removed today

‚Ä¢ Replacements onboarded



Reports must be numeric and structured. No long-form summaries.



?



Time & Availability Requirements



‚Ä¢ Must overlap with U.S. business hours

‚Ä¢ Same-day response required for enforcement decisions

‚Ä¢ Must be available daily during the sprint period

‚Ä¢ High-speed enforcement environment



Delays in response will impact pod performance.



?



Fraud Prevention & Quality Control



You are responsible for verifying:



‚Ä¢ No fake logs

‚Ä¢ No duplicate leads

‚Ä¢ Spreadsheet entries are accurate

‚Ä¢ Screenshot proof matches logged activity



Verification is required before approving work.



?



Hiring Channels



You will source and recruit setters through legal freelance and hiring platforms, including:



‚Ä¢ OnlineJobs.ph

‚Ä¢
 groups

‚Ä¢ Fiverr

‚Ä¢ LinkedIn

‚Ä¢ Other compliant freelance marketplaces



You are responsible for filtering and qualifying candidates.



?



Who This Role Is For



This role is for individuals who:



‚Ä¢ Are comfortable enforcing rules

‚Ä¢ Can make removal decisions without hesitation

‚Ä¢ Can build a 10-person pod quickly

‚Ä¢ Operate well under measurable performance metrics

‚Ä¢ Are detail-oriented and disciplined



This is not a creative strategy role. It is an execution and control role.



?



Application Instructions (Mandatory)



To apply, send one message answering the following clearly:

 1. Do you understand this is an enforcement-based management role?

 2. Can you recruit and build a 10-person pod within 72 hours?

 3. Are you comfortable removing underperformers the same day without hesitation?



Only structured responses answering all three questions will be reviewed.

Handing off ‚Äúhot leads‚Äù (name + number + summary) to the shop manager



You will be trained and managed with clear systems and scripts.

You are not guessing. You are executing.



Schedule (Colorado Mountain Time ‚Äì USA):



Full-Time ‚Äì 40‚Äì45 hrs/week



Tuesday ‚Äì Friday: 6:00 AM ‚Äì 2:00 PM

Saturday: 2:00 PM ‚Äì 10:00 PM



(Exact shifts may adjust slightly based on performance and needs.)



What We‚Äôre Looking For:



Excellent written English



Professional tone and strong communication skills



Reliable high-speed internet



Strong attention to detail



Highly organized



Comfortable working inside Notion / CRM systems



Coachable and responsive to feedback



Able to follow systems exactly



Experience in DM setting, appointment booking, or social media management is a big plus.



Compensation:



Fixed Monthly Salary:

$500‚Äì$800 USD per month, depending on experience and demonstrated performance.



Performance-based raises available after 60‚Äì90 days.



Long-term opportunity for the right candidate.



Important:



This role requires focus, consistency, and accountability.

You will be expected to track your daily activity (DMs sent, leads logged, follow-ups completed).



To Apply:



Submit:



Your resume



A CUSTOM short intro video (2 minutes or less) explaining:



Why you are a good fit



Your experience with DMs or lead generation



Why we should choose you



If you do not submit a custom video, your application will not be considered.



If you are proactive, detail-oriented, and want stable long-term remote work ‚Äî apply below.

title: Funnel Builder & Designer
description:
About Daily Media Group:

Daily Media Group is a dynamic media company specialising in creating and marketing our own digital and physical products. Our product range includes online courses, educational workbooks, and physical journals designed to help our customers achieve their personal and professional goals. We are looking for a talented Funnel Builder & Designer to join our team and help us create high-converting sales funnels that drive growth and maximise revenue.



Role Overview:

As our Funnel Builder & Designer, you will be responsible for designing, building, and optimising sales funnels using ClickFunnels as our primary platform. You will work closely with our marketing team to create compelling landing pages, sales pages, and complete funnel sequences that convert visitors into customers. This role requires both technical proficiency and creative flair, with a strong understanding of what makes people click, engage, and buy.



Key Responsibilities:

1. Design, build, and maintain high-converting sales funnels using ClickFunnels

2. Create visually appealing and user-friendly landing pages, sales pages, opt-in pages, and thank you pages

3. Implement and manage A/B testing strategies to continuously improve conversion rates

4. Analyse funnel performance metrics and provide data-driven recommendations for optimisation

5. Collaborate with the marketing team to develop compelling copy and messaging for funnel pages

6. Integrate funnels with
 marketing platforms, payment processors, and other third-party tools

7. Build upsell, downsell, and order bump sequences to maximise average order value

8. Stay current with industry best practices, ClickFunnels updates, and conversion optimisation trends

9. Ensure all funnels are mobile-responsive and provide an excellent user experience across devices



Requirements:

1. Minimum 2-3 years of hands-on experience building and designing sales funnels

2. Proven proficiency with ClickFunnels (this is our primary platform ‚Äì experience is essential)

3. Strong portfolio demonstrating previous funnel work ‚Äì you must be able to show examples of funnels you have built

4. Solid understanding of direct response marketing principles and buyer psychology

5. Experience with A/B testing and conversion rate optimisation (CRO)

6. Basic understanding of marketing copywriting and what makes copy convert

7. Strong eye for design with the ability to create professional, brand-consistent pages

8. Ability to interpret analytics data and translate insights into actionable improvements

9. Excellent attention to detail and ability to work independently



Preferred Qualifications:

- Experience with other funnel platforms (Kajabi, Kartra, Leadpages) is a plus

- Copywriting skills or experience working with direct response copy

- Knowledge of
 marketing platforms (ActiveCampaign, ConvertKit, Mailchimp)

- Understanding of paid advertising 
 Ads, Google Ads) and how funnels integrate with ad campaigns

- Experience with Stripe, PayPal, or other payment gateway integrations

- Familiarity with digital product launches and evergreen funnel strategies

- Basic HTML/CSS knowledge for custom styling



What We Offer:

- Flexible working arrangement ‚Äì part-time or full-time positions available

- Remote work opportunity with flexible hours

- Competitive compensation based on experience

- Opportunity to work on diverse projects across multiple product lines

- Collaborative and creative team environment

- Room for growth as our company expands

- 13th month pay

- PTO/Paid Philippine Holidays



Fill out this form for the next steps:

Knowledge of Australian tax and superannuation environment

title: Real Estate Transaction Manager/ Listing Coordinator
description:
PLEASE READ FULL DESCRIPTION AND FOLLOW APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS FOR CONSIDERATION



ABOUT US:

We are currently seeking 1-2 motivated and experienced Real estate Listing Manager/ Transaction Coordinator professionals as a dedicated hi-level support staff  for our Real Estate Team.  



JOB OVERVIEW:

This position requires an experienced and highly skilled candidate who will primarily focus on supporting the real estate transaction process, ensuring smooth and timely closings. Previous Listing coordinator and MLS experience and in depth knowledge of the contract to close process is required. Please do not apply if you do not have high level, hands on Listing and Transaction management experience. We are not looking fort general support.  Experience with eXp Systems is a plus. You‚Äôll also provide general administrative support. This is an exciting opportunity for someone who is detail-oriented, highly organized, and looking to grow in the real estate industry.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

- Transaction Management: Oversee and support the full real estate transaction process from contract to closing, including coordinating timelines, documents, and communication between agents, clients, and other parties.

- MLS Listings: Create and manage property listings on Multiple Listing Services (experience with OneKey/HGAR MLS is a plus)

- Property Descriptions: Write compelling and accurate property descriptions to showcase listings.

- Administrative Support: Assist the with tasks such as managing
 inquiries, organizing documents, and scheduling appointments.

- Social Media & Content Creation: Post and create content for listings  on social media platforms.

- Client and Partner Outreach: Manage outbound calls, texts and
s to agents, attorneys, lenders and clients to assist in deal follow ups and transaction management



LOOKING FOR:

- Minimum 1 year of real estate experience, preferably with eXp Realty systems like SkySlope.

- Previous direct support of top producing listing agents managing listings from start to finish.

- In depth understanding of the Real Estate transaction contract to close process

- Experience with managing and responding to communications on behalf of CEO

- Ability to manage 20+ transactions at once and keep track of changing status and priorities. 

- Strong proficiency with Google Drive, MLS, CRM, Canva and eXp tools.

- Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English.

- Highly organized, quick thinking and able to manage multiple tasks and deadlines simultaneously.

- A positive, team-oriented attitude with a strong desire to grow and succeed in the real estate industry.



APPLICATION (MUST BE FOLLOWED IN DETAIL OR APPLICATION WILL NOT BE REVIEWED):
