mber, not a short-term freelancer.



If you love Amazon advertising, enjoy solving complex problems, and want to grow with a team that values performance and initiative ‚Äî apply with examples of accounts you‚Äôve managed and results you‚Äôve achieved.

title: Site Survey Coordinator ( Solar)
description:
Location 

Philippines (Remote) US BASED SOLAR 

Role Overview 

The Site Survey Coordinator is responsible for managing the day-to-day scheduling operations of 

SpartanX site surveyors and serving as a central communication hub between homeowners, field staff, 

and internal departments. This role ensures that site surveys are scheduled efficiently, homeowners are 

properly informed, and surveyors are deployed with optimized routes and realistic timelines. The 

Coordinator maintains schedule integrity, prevents operational conflicts, and supports high completion 

and success rates for field surveys. This role is highly organized, time-sensitive, communication-driven, 

and operationally critical. 

Key Responsibilities 

Scheduling & Daily Operations Oversight 

? Oversee and maintain the daily schedule of site surveyors 

? Monitor active schedules to ensure efficiency, timeliness, and accuracy 

? Create schedule blocks to prevent double bookings and minimize delays 

? Adjust schedules in real time based on field conditions or changes 

? Maintain clear visibility into surveyor capacity and availability 

Homeowner Communication 

? Call homeowners to confirm appointments and notify them of surveyor arrival windows 

? Handle inbound homeowner calls, including reschedule and cancellation requests 

? Ensure homeowners receive timely and accurate scheduling information 

? Maintain professional, clear, and courteous communication at all times 

Surveyor Coordination 

? Communicate schedule updates, changes, and route details to surveyors 

? Provide timely support for schedule conflicts or field timing issues 

? Ensure surveyors have clear expectations for daily assignments 

? Coordinate adjustments to maintain on-time performance 

Route Optimization & Efficiency Management 

? Plan and optimize survey routes to minimize travel time and maximize daily completions 

? Sequence appointments logically based on geography and timing constraints 

? Monitor performance trends and adjust routing practices to improve success rates 

Cross-Department Communication 

? Coordinate scheduling and operational updates with Sales Concierge and Sales Operations 

? Collaborate with the Site Survey Quality Control (QC) team to align scheduling with QC 

availability and workflow needs 

? Provide timely updates regarding schedule changes, delays, or operational impacts 

? Support smooth handoffs between departments involved in the survey process 

Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) 

Performance in this role is measured using the following core metrics: 

? On-Time Survey Execution 

? High percentage of surveys starting within scheduled arrival windows 

? Route Efficiency 

? Optimized routing that supports maximum daily survey completion 

? Homeowner Communication Responsiveness 

? Timely confirmation calls and prompt handling of reschedule or cancellation requests 

? Operational Coordination 

? Effective communication across departments with minimal workflow disruption 

Additional performance indicators may include: 

? Reduction in same-day scheduling conflicts 

? Reduction in surveyor idle time or travel inefficiencies 

? Improved survey completion and success rates 

? Consistency of schedule management across survey teams 

Required Skills & Qualifications 

? Strong organizational and time management skills 

? Ability to manage multiple schedules and priorities simultaneously 

? Clear and professional verbal communication skills in English 

? Ability to make real-time decisions in a fast-paced operational environment 

? Strong attention to detail and accuracy in scheduling 

? Comfort communicating with both customers and field personnel 

? Reliable internet connection and ability to handle frequent calls 

Preferred 

? Experience in scheduling, dispatch, or operations coordination 

? Experience supporting field teams or service technicians 

? Familiarity with route planning or logistics coordination 

? Experience in customer service or call-based support environments 

? Prior remote operational support experience

Pay:

Quick About me:

I have been doing real estate for 8 years, entrepreneurship for 10 years. I‚Äôve grown my social media on TikTok and instagram. I live in Miami Florida and am focused heavily on my work and growth in my business.



To Apply for the Job:

2. What company do I work for? 
 instagram)

3. (Label this answer 1.) At the top of your message write 2-3 sentences on why you would like this position, and why you are a good fit. Do not write more than that or else your application will be deleted.

Make sure to follow all the steps above. This is a great job opportunity with the ability to get bonuses and raises, so I will only look at applicants that really want the job. If I d
 to interview you there will be a short zoom call between us and a camera will be required.



Do not write more than what I have asked you above, if you write more than what is asked for above I will ignore your job post.



Thank you,

Johnny Madriz

- Creative finance (Subject-To, seller finance)

- Direct-to-seller marketing

We focus heavily on marketing first because in wholesaling, He or she that controls the lead controls the money. Marketing is the lifeblood of this business



Your role?:

???? Your Main Responsibilities:

We target OFF-MARKET motivated sellers such as:

-Pre-foreclosures

-Probates

-Code violations

-Vacant properties



We do NOT rely on MLS/on-market deals.

We hunt for NEED-to-sell situations ‚Äî not want-to-sell.



???? Pay Structure



Starting Pay: $3/hour



But here‚Äôs the key‚Ä¶



This is performance-based growth.



You will receive:

? Raises based on performance

? Bonus per qualified lead

? Bonus per deal closed

? Opportunity to become Acquisition Manager

If you prove yourself, you WILL earn more. Period.

We reward producers.



???? You Must:

Speak clear, fluent English

Have strong internet connection

Have a quiet workspace

Be comfortable hearing ‚Äúno‚Äù

Be coachable

Not take rejection personally

Be competitive

If you‚Äôre scared to talk to strangers, this is not for you.



? Who This Is NOT For

People who just want hourly pay with no effort

People who disappear randomly

People who can‚Äôt handle rejection

People who don‚Äôt like tracking numbers



???? Growth Opportunity

If you perform well:

-Hourly increases

-Lead manager position

-Acquisition role

-Long-term partnership potential

-We build teams for the long run.



???? To Apply Send us:

-Your cold calling experience (if any)

-Voice recording sample (1‚Äì2 minutes introducing yourself)

-Your internet speed test screenshot

-Why we should pick you

-Put in the subject line: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm Ready to Produce Deals‚Äù

title: Revenue Operations Lead ‚Äì Part Time (UK B2B Infrastructure Platform)
description:
Employment Type

Part-Time ‚Äì 20 Hours Per Week

Must work approximately 4‚Äì5 hours daily within UK business hours



Compensation

$8‚Äì$10 per hour depending on CRM automation and revenue operations experience

Performance-based expansion to full-time available



About the Role



We are a UK-based B2B technology platform operating in a regulated professional services market.



The founder executes high-volume outbound (50‚Äì80 professional calls per day). The platform is growing rapidly and requires a disciplined revenue operations lead to ensure zero pipeline leakage.



This is not a virtual assistant role.



This is a precision operations role responsible for maintaining the integrity of a live outbound revenue engine.



You will operate as the control layer between founder activity and structured follow-up execution.



The Mission



Your responsibility is to ensure:



‚Ä¢ No lead is lost

‚Ä¢ Every call outcome is logged accurately

‚Ä¢ Every next action is scheduled

‚Ä¢ Every submission deadline is tracked

‚Ä¢ Every urgent opportunity is surfaced before it expires

‚Ä¢ Follow-ups are executed within minutes, not days



You are responsible for pipeline control.



Core Responsibilities



CRM Discipline and Pipeline Integrity

‚Ä¢ Log 50‚Äì80 daily call outcomes accurately inside Attio (or similar CRM)

‚Ä¢ Maintain strict stage definitions and required fields

‚Ä¢ Track submission dates and trigger 48‚Äì72 hour deadline alerts

‚Ä¢ Monitor stagnation rules and surface stalled opportunities

‚Ä¢ Conduct daily CRM audits to prevent leakage



Real-Time Follow-Up Execution

‚Ä¢ Send personalised follow-up
s within 15 minutes of call completion

‚Ä¢ Trigger structured SMS follow-ups when required

‚Ä¢ Prepare LinkedIn touchpoints based on call notes

‚Ä¢ Maintain clean, professional written tone suitable for UK architects



Data and List Expansion

‚Ä¢ Build and enrich B2B contact lists

‚Ä¢ Validate and deduplicate data

‚Ä¢ Segment contacts by geography and firm profile

‚Ä¢ Maintain clean import workflows



Reporting and Insight

‚Ä¢ Produce weekly pipeline summaries

‚Ä¢ Track stage movement and velocity

‚Ä¢ Identify leakage points and workflow inefficiencies

‚Ä¢ Suggest automation improvements



Required Profile



‚Ä¢ Strong experience using CRM systems such as HubSpot, Salesforce, Attio, Pipedrive or equivalent

‚Ä¢ Comfortable designing and maintaining workflow triggers and automation rules

‚Ä¢ Advanced written English suitable for UK professional audiences

‚Ä¢ Highly structured thinker who enjoys systems and precision

‚Ä¢ Comfortable operating under volume and daily activity



This role requires operational discipline and structured thinking. It is not a content creation or social media role.



Working Hours



Must overlap with UK business hours.

Approximately 4‚Äì5 hours daily between 9:00am‚Äì5:00pm UK time.



Growth Opportunity



This role is designed to expand.



High performers will be considered for:



‚Ä¢ Increased hours

‚Ä¢ Full-time engagement

‚Ä¢ Senior Revenue Operations leadership as the platform scales



Application Requirements



To apply, please submit:



A clear explanation of how you would manage 70 daily call outcomes in a CRM without losing leads.



A description of the most advanced CRM workflow or automation you have built.



A brief example of how you improved pipeline discipline in a previous role.



Shortlisted candidates will complete a paid practical assessment.

What We Offer

Hours: Part-time: 20 hours/week | 4 hours/day

Payment Schedule: Bi-weekly on the 15th and last day of each month

- Strong portfolio ‚Äî Your portfolio must showcase polished, professional work.

Why Work With Us?

- Opportunity to grow ‚Äî We're open to transitioning the right candidate to full-time if it turns out to be a strong mutual fit.



Important Notes

How to Apply

Send your application to 

Subject line: [Application ‚Äì Graphic Designer - Type#]

If you believe you're a strong fit and you're ready to contribute to a growing team, we'd love to hear from you. We're excited to find the right person to build with us.

title: Scheduling Assistant
description:
ABOUT 10X HEALTH SYSTEM

10X Health System is a pioneering company at the forefront of the health and wellness industry, dedicated to revolutionizing the way individuals approach their personal health and well-being. With a philosophy rooted in the principle that optimal health is the foundation for a life lived to the fullest, 10X Health provides cutting-edge solutions and personalized health plans designed to empower individuals to achieve and maintain peak physical and mental performance.



The company's comprehensive approach to health combines the latest advances in medical science, nutrition, fitness, and technology to offer a suite of services that include state-of-the-art diagnostic testing, individualized treatment protocols, and ongoing support from a team of world-class health professionals. 10X Health's commitment to innovation and results has established it as a leader in the health optimization space, catering to those who strive to push the boundaries of what is possible in their health journey.



POSITION SUMMARY

The Scheduling Assistant will support the Scheduling Team by ensuring smooth and timely patient communications. This role will focus on outreach to patients regarding blood work completion, appointment confirmations, and rescheduling tasks. The ideal candidate is detail-oriented, organized, and experienced in clinical scheduling environments with a strong understanding of patient privacy compliance.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

Patient Outreach

- Conduct proactive outreach to patients on a defined cadence after bloodwork is purchased and a lab requisition has been sent.

- Remind patients to complete blood work at one of our clinics or at a partner patient service center.

Appointment Management

- Confirm appointments with patients the day prior to their scheduled time.

- Reschedule appointments as needed to accommodate patient or provider changes.

- Assist with rebooking for no-show patients and other scheduling adjustments.

Administrative Support

- Collaborate with the Scheduling Team to ensure accurate documentation of patient communications.

- Maintain compliance with internal protocols, HIPAA, and privacy regulations.

- Support other scheduling or administrative tasks as assigned.



COMPETENCIES

‚Ä¢ Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.

‚Ä¢ Ability to multitask and prioritize in a fast-paced environment.

‚Ä¢ Excellent organizational and time-management skills.

‚Ä¢ Detail-oriented with a high degree of accuracy.

‚Ä¢ Team-player mindset with a proactive approach to problem-solving.



EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE

‚Ä¢ High school diploma or equivalent (Associate‚Äôs or Bachelor‚Äôs degree preferred).

‚Ä¢ Minimum 1‚Äì2 years of experience in a healthcare or clinical scheduling role.

‚Ä¢ Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Outlook, Excel, Word).

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with electronic health record (EHR) or scheduling systems preferred.

‚Ä¢ Knowledge of HIPAA and patient privacy compliance requirements.



COMMITMENT TO DIVERSITY

As an equal opportunity employer committed to meeting the needs of a multigenerational and multicultural workforce, 10X Health System recognizes that a diverse staff, reflective of our community, is an integral and welcome part of a successful and ethical business. We hire local talent at all levels regardless of race, color, religion, age, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, or disability, and actively foster inclusion in all forms both within our company and across interactions with clients, candidates, and partners.



If this position caught your eye, send us your resume! For best consideration, please complete the online application form:


/

title: Now Hiring: Senior Executive Assistant to Founding Partners

Our client is seeking a Senior Executive Assistant who operates at a high strategic level and can serve as a trusted partner to the founding leadership team.



This is not a traditional administrative support role.

This is a senior-level executive support position designed for someone who understands how to operate alongside decision-makers in complex, regulated, and high-accountability environments.



The Opportunity

Executive-level strategic discussions



Corporate formation and governance processes



Legal and compliance coordination



Early-stage operational design



Multi-executive leadership alignment



The selected candidate will support four founding executives and function as a central coordination point across leadership, legal counsel, finance, and key external stakeholders.



The right individual will help bring structure, clarity, and disciplined follow-through to a company being built from the ground up.



Core Responsibilities

Executive Strategy & Leadership Support

Ensure execution and follow-through across leadership initiatives

Organizational Systems & Infrastructure

Operational Execution & Accountability

Ideal Candidate Profile

title: 3D Website Developer
description:
We are building a short-term project and are looking for a talented Website Developer to bring our vision to life. If we love your work, this could lead to collaborations on future long-term projects.



The project is a 3D interactive website with a Roman Colosseum theme. When users visit the site, they will see five large blocks of marble placed in a stunning Colosseum setting. These blocks will gradually transform into detailed Roman statues as we update them through our backend system.



We can either hire a designer to create the 3D models, or you can create them yourself for a bonus. Your job will be to integrate these visuals into a functional, interactive website. The end product should be:



Visually captivating: Seamlessly displaying 3D animations.

User-friendly: Offering a smooth, interactive experience.

Scalable: Ready for future updates and additional features.

Modifiable: With backend, we are able to edit the marble blocks to become statues.



Key Responsibilities:

Set up a backend connection for real-time updates to the marble blocks.

Optimize for performance and compatibility across devices.



If you‚Äôre excited about creating visually stunning and engaging websites, let‚Äôs talk!



Please reply with "ROME" if you are interested and understand the role.

The platform streamlines essential business functions such as rostering, invoicing, reporting, and compliance management. By automating these processes, Vertex360 helps providers reduce errors, save time, and remain fully aligned with NDIS requirements. As a growing company,

title: Lodgements Specialist
description:
Position Description ‚Äì Lodgements Specialist



Position Title: Lodgements Specialist

Location: Philippines (Remote)

Reporting To: Partner ‚Äì Melbourne, Australia

Employment Type: Full-time



Role Purpose

The Lodgements Specialist is responsible for ensuring 100% of client lodgements are completed accurately and on time. This is a monitoring, coordination, and reporting role, acting as the central point of control between the Partner, accountants, bookkeepers, and clients.



This role does not primarily prepare accounting work but ensures all work is tracked, progressed, escalated, and lodged within required monthly and quarterly deadlines.



Key Objectives



Achieve zero late lodgements



Maintain real-time visibility of client lodgement status



Ensure bookkeeping is up to date to support accurate lodgements



Provide clear, proactive reporting to the Partner



Act early on risks, delays, or missing information



Key Responsibilities



1. Lodgement Monitoring & Control



Maintain a master lodgement tracker covering BAS (Monthly/Quarterly), IAS, PAYG, Superannuation, and other statutory lodgements as required



Monitor due dates and internal deadlines to ensure all lodgements are completed on time



Flag upcoming, overdue, or at-risk lodgements immediately



Ensure all lodgements are properly recorded and confirmed once completed



2. Bookkeeping Oversight



Monitor whether client bookkeeping is up to date and complete



Identify gaps, missing transactions, or delays that may impact lodgements



Coordinate with bookkeepers to prioritize work as deadlines approach



Escalate recurring bookkeeping issues to the Partner



3. Coordination & Follow-Ups



Coordinate work between accountants, bookkeepers, clients, and Partner



Follow up on missing client information, outstanding work, or unconfirmed lodgements



Ensure smooth handovers between bookkeeping and accounting teams



Keep communication clear, documented, and deadline-driven



4. Reporting & Communication



Provide regular lodgement status reports to the Partner (daily/weekly as required)



Highlight completed lodgements, upcoming deadlines, risks, or clients requiring attention



Communicate proactively with the Melbourne office to ensure no surprises



5. Process & System Discipline



Use firm systems, spreadsheets, or practice management tools to track all lodgements



Ensure data is accurate, up to date, and consistently maintained



Identify process gaps or recurring issues and suggest improvements



Support the Partner in strengthening lodgement control systems



Key Relationships



Partner ‚Äì Melbourne (Direct Reporting)



Accountants



Bookkeepers



Clients (for follow-ups and missing information)



Skills & Experience



Essential:



Experience in accounting, bookkeeping, or practice administration



Strong understanding of BAS, IAS, PAYG, Super cycles, and monthly/quarterly lodgement workflows



Exceptional organizational and follow-up skills



Strong written and verbal English communication



Ability to manage multiple deadlines simultaneously



High attention to detail and accountability



Highly Regarded:



Experience working with Australian accounting firms



Familiarity with practice management software (e.g., Xero Practice Manager, Karbon, FYI)



Experience working remotely with Australian teams



Key Competencies



Proactive and deadline-driven



Comfortable chasing, escalating, and following up



Strong sense of ownership and responsibility



Clear, confident communicator across time zones



Structured, organized, and methodical



KPIs & Performance Measures



100% on-time lodgement rate



Zero missed statutory deadlines



Accuracy and completeness of lodgement tracking



Timeliness and quality of reporting to Partner



Reduction in last-minute lodgement risks



Responsiveness and communication effectiveness



Work Schedule



Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM ‚Äì 5:00 PM (Melbourne time)



Fixed schedule, weekends off



Compensation & Benefits



Salary: PHP 40,000 ‚Äì 50,000 per month, based on qualifications, experience, and interview



Leave credits after regularization



Fixed working hours with strong work‚Äìlife balance



Opportunities for performance growth and career progression



Why Join Us?



Stable full-time role with predictable hours



Competitive salary based on experience



Supportive and process-driven environment



Clear expectations and measurable performance metrics



How to Apply:

Send your resume, cover letter, and a short video explaining why we should hire you.



Important: Add to the subject line: Lodgements Specialist

Applications without this subject line will not be shortlisted.

title: Creative Strategist (DTC E-commerce ‚Äì Meta & TikTok)
description:
We‚Äôre a high-performance DTC e-commerce company spending aggressively on Meta & TikTok, and we‚Äôre hiring a Creative Strategist who understands what actually makes ads scale. This is not about making pretty videos ‚Äî it‚Äôs about breaking down winning ads, engineering new angles, and building scalable creative systems that increase MER through stronger hooks and retention. If you think in hook rate, hold rate, emotional triggers, and angle testing ‚Äî this role is for you.



Your mission is to analyze winning creatives (angle, hook, emotion, proof structure, format), generate high-potential variations, and develop completely new scalable concepts. You will deliver production-ready briefs including hook options, script direction, proof elements, B-roll guidance, on-screen text, and performance hypotheses. You are not editing ‚Äî you are architecting the ideas behind ads that convert.



We‚Äôre looking for someone with experience on DTC brands spending $30k+/month who understands scroll-stopping psychology and creative fatigue. To apply, send 2‚Äì3 concepts you created that scaled, one breakdown of a winning ad (structure + angle + hook), your past ad spend exposure, and availability. If you think like a media buyer ‚Äî not a designer ‚Äî we want to talk.

title: E-commerce Operations Assistant (Shopify & Klaviyo Expert)
description:
About Us:

We are a London-based direct-to-consumer brand in the active travel and sports space. We design modular, weatherproof gear for athletes and travelers, and we are growing fast. We are a small, fully remote team that values high-quality design, clear communication, and efficient systems.



The Role:

We are looking for a highly organized E-commerce Operations Assistant to support the Founder and the Operations Manager. You will be the "technical engine" behind our store‚Äîexecuting daily tasks in Shopify, Klaviyo, and our project management tools so the rest of the team can focus on strategy and growth.



What You Will Do:



Shopify Management: create and update product listings, manage inventory levels, process orders, and handle backend store maintenance.



Klaviyo Execution: schedule
 campaigns (we provide the copy/design; you build and send), manage list segmentation, and monitor flow performance.



Project Management: keep our internal task boards (ClickUp/Asana) up to date, ensuring deadlines are met and files are organized.



Operational Support: assist with customer data entry, scheduling, and general administrative tasks to keep the business running smoothly.



Who You Are:



A Shopify Native: You know your way around the backend without needing a map. You know how to check inventory, fulfill orders, and update themes.



Process-Driven: You love checklists. If you see a messy folder or an broken link, you fix it immediately.



Tech-Savvy: You are proficient in project management tools (ClickUp, Asana, etc.) and communication tools (Slack).



Reliable: You don't need micromanagement. You take ownership of your tasks and communicate clearly if you hit a roadblock.



Fluent English: Excellent written communication is non-negotiable.



Requirements:



Proven experience managing Shopify stores (portfolio or examples required).



Experience setting up and sending campaigns in Klaviyo.



Availability to communicate during UK/European business hours.



How to Apply:

Please send a brief cover letter and examples of Shopify stores or Klaviyo campaigns you have managed. Tell us about a specific operational problem you solved for a previous client.

title: Bookkeeper Virtual Assistant
description:
Position Overview



We are seeking a detail-oriented and reliable Bookkeeper Virtual Assistant to support our accounting and financial operations. The ideal candidate must have strong experience in QuickBooks. Familiarity with ServiceTitan is highly preferred but not required, with the ability to manage invoices, perform reconciliations, and assist with month-end financial reviews.

This role requires excellent organizational skills, can work independently, accuracy, and the ability to work independently while coordinating with internal team members.



???? Key Responsibilities

1. Invoice and Bill Processing

Save and organize all incoming invoices and bills in the proper filing system

Enter invoices and bills into QuickBooks Online accurately

Post transactions to the correct vendor, account, and payment method

Review invoices for errors or duplicates before posting





2. Expense and Transaction Monitoring

Review and categorize bank transactions synced in QuickBooks

Ensure expenses are coded to the correct accounts

Identify missing, duplicate, or incorrectly posted transactions

Perform weekly transaction cleanup and accuracy checks





3. Undeposited Funds Management

Verify payment amounts, applied payments, and balances

Batch and post deposits to the appropriate accounts

Ensure payment records match QuickBooks data



4. Credit Card Management and Reconciliation

Coordinate with team members to obtain monthly credit card statements

Reconcile multiple credit card accounts in QuickBooks

Compare statement transactions against QuickBooks entries

Identify and resolve:

Missing transactions

Duplicate entries

Incorrect expense categorizations

Post any missing transactions

Maintain reconciliation reports using Excel when needed



5. Bank Reconciliation

Reconcile multiple checking accounts monthly

Verify deposits, withdrawals, transfers, and refunds

Ensure balances match bank statements and QuickBooks records

Investigate discrepancies and make corrections



6. Month-End Close Support

Reconcile ServiceTitan revenue with QuickBooks revenue reports

Investigate revenue discrepancies or unusual fluctuations

Assist with adjusting journal entries when required



7. Profit and Loss and Expense Analysis

Run monthly Profit & Loss reports (accrual basis)

Analyze expenses and compare against:

Previous months

Prior year data

Review detailed transactions for:

Correct vendor and account coding

Proper posting dates

Supporting documentation



8. Financial Data Quality Control

Identify and correct:

Duplicate expenses

Personal or non-business expenses

Misclassified transactions

Improper credit card postings

Review and validate large or unusual transactions

Assist with expense adjustments and reclassifications



9. Documentation and Reporting

Maintain supporting documents such as invoices, receipts, and expense records

Document financial variances and unusual transactions

Prepare notes and reports for management review

Flag items requiring approval or follow-up



10. Team Coordination

Communicate regularly with accounting team members

Participate in review meetings and financial presentations

Provide administrative and bookkeeping support as needed



? Required Qualifications

Proven experience as a Bookkeeper

Strong experience with QuickBooks

Experience or familiarity with ServiceTitan (Highly Preferred but not required)

Experience in HVAC industry is a plus

Strong understanding of reconciliation processes

Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills

Proficiency in Excel or Google Sheets

Ability to work independently and meet deadlines

Strong written and verbal English communication skills



? Preferred Skills

Experience supporting U.S. based businesses

Experience with month-end close processes

Knowledge of accrual accounting

Experience working as a Virtual Assistant or remote bookkeeper



? Work Schedule

Aligned with U.S. business hours ‚Äì EST Timezone (to be discussed)



???? Work Setup Requirements

Reliable internet connection

Backup power and internet

Quiet and professional work environment

title: Short-Form Video Editor (Chat-Based Storytelling Concept)
description:
We are looking for a creative and trend-aware short-form video editor to produce engaging Dutch-language social media content centered around chat-based storytelling.



The core concept:

Each video showcases a flirty conversation (Instagram, WhatsApp, etc.) where one person is trying to ‚Äúrizz‚Äù the other. The progression of the conversation is visualized through a strong storytelling format (this can include sports clips, gaming visuals, cinematic moments, memes, or other creative metaphors). The editing should clearly reflect emotional shifts ‚Äî wins, losses, tension, recovery ‚Äî in an entertaining and highly engaging way.



These videos promote Taki AI, a digital wingman app that allows users to upload screenshots of their conversations and receive smart, flirty reply suggestions.



Important:

All videos must be in Dutch (subtitles, chat text, hooks). AI translation tools may be used, or we can provide the original conversations.



Responsibilities:

- Edit short-form vertical videos (TikTok / Instagram Reels format).

- Integrate DUTCH chat-style screenshots into compelling visual storytelling.

- Develop creative visual metaphors beyond football (sports, gaming, pop culture, cinematic scenes, etc.).

- Ensure the first 2‚Äì3 seconds capture attention.

- Maintain consistent branding and tone across videos.



Requirements:

- Proven experience with short-form viral content.

- Strong understanding of internet culture and Gen Z humor.

- Ability to create engaging narrative pacing from simple chat screenshots.

- Comfort working in Dutch (or using AI tools to localize properly).

- Reliable delivery and clear communication.



Nice to Have:

- Experience editing meme-style or storytelling content.

- Knowledge of dating culture and social media trends.

- Creative mindset for developing repeatable content formats.



If you can transform chat screenshots into addictive short-form content, we‚Äôd love to see your portfolio and ideas.



mail 
 for more info and example videos.

title: Risk Management / CFO
description:
Job Title: Risk Management & Resolution Lead



Department: Finance / Operations

Reports To: Designated Stakeholders (Dual Reporting Line)

Employment Type: Contract / Offshore

Start Date: ASAP

Compensation: $8 per hour (Not more than $100 per week)

Role Overview



The Risk Management & Resolution Lead is responsible for identifying, managing, and resolving operational and strategic risks across the organization. This role ensures business stability by driving accountability, cross-functional coordination, and structured resolution of high-impact issues.



Operating in a high-exposure environment, the role requires proactive risk assessment, strong execution discipline, and consistent stakeholder reporting. The individual will have cross-team coordination authority to ensure timely mitigation and operational stability.



Key Responsibilities

Cross-team coordination authority

Required Qualifications

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

Ability to manage sensitive information with discretion

description:

Location: Remote / Los Angeles area preferred

Industry: Port Drayage & Container Transportation

Employment Type: Full-time or Part-time



About Us



MTZ Trucking is a local drayage provider servicing the Ports of Los Angeles and Long Beach. We specialize in reliable container transportation for freight forwarders, importers, exporters, and distribution centers. We are growing and looking for motivated Lead Generators to help expand our customer base by setting qualified meetings for our sales team.



Role Overview



The Lead Generator is responsible for identifying, contacting, and qualifying potential customers who ship containers through the Ports of LA and Long Beach. Your primary goal is to schedule meetings between qualified prospects and our sales team.



This is a performance-driven role ideal for someone who is confident on the phone, persistent, and comfortable speaking with logistics professionals.



Key Responsibilities

Prospecting & Research

Identify companies importing/exporting through the Ports of Los Angeles & Long Beach

Target freight forwarders, NVOCCs, importers, exporters, and warehouses

Build and maintain prospect lists using LinkedIn, Google, and industry directories

Track leads in CRM or spreadsheet

Outreach & Lead Generation

Conduct cold calls to qualify shipping needs and decision-makers

Send follow-up
s 

Ask discovery questions to determine container volume, lanes, and pain points

Overcome objections and build rapport with logistics managers

Appointment Setting

Schedule qualified meetings for the sales team

Ensure prospects meet qualification criteria (volume, port usage, decision authority)

Confirm appointments and send calendar invites

Maintain accurate notes on each interaction





Performance Tracking

Meet weekly KPIs:

Calls made

Conversations held

Qualified leads generated

Meetings scheduled

Provide feedback on messaging and market response



Ideal Candidate

Required Skills

Strong communication and phone skills

Confidence in cold calling and handling objections

Organized and detail-oriented

Self-motivated with a results-driven mindset



Preferred Experience

Experience in logistics, trucking, freight forwarding, or supply chain

B2B lead generation or appointment setting

Familiarity with ports, containers, or drayage (a plus but not required)



Compensation 

Base pay ($5/hr)

Performance bonuses per qualified meeting

Additional bonuses for closed deals 





A successful Lead Generator in this role will:

Consistently schedule qualified meetings each week

Build a strong pipeline of drayage prospects

Improve contact rates and messaging effectiveness

Help increase direct shipper and forwarder accounts

title: Short-Form Video Editor (CapCut Pro) ‚Äî Brand Style Execution Specialist
description:
Description



We are seeking a highly dependable short-form video editor with active CapCut Pro experience to support consistent content production for a 220k+ follower brand.



This role is about execution and replication, not general social media posting or basic cutting. You will work with an established style guide and deliver reels that match the brand‚Äôs look, feel, and engagement strategy.



This position is part-time / contract, with weekly deliverables and a strong focus on accuracy, speed, and creative alignment.



What You‚Äôll Do



? Study existing brand content and match style √ó retention-optimized editing

? Clean edit, captions, and effects for short-form (primarily Instagram Reels)

? Deliver polished videos with a 48-hour turnaround routinely

? Provide multiple versions when requested (style variations)

? Take direction and implement revisions efficiently

? Communicate clearly and professionally with clients and internal team



Required Skills & Experience



Must have:



???? Active CapCut Pro subscription ‚Äî daily use, not learning on the job

???? Portfolio of 10+ short-form videos edited by you (Reels, TikTok, Shorts)

???? Experience editing for brands with substantial reach (10k+ followers)

???? Strong English communication

???? Ability to work with minimal supervision and meet deadlines



Nice to Have (Not Required for Full Consideration)



? Understanding of engagement / retention metrics

? Experience in wellness, healthcare, education, or similar fields

? Familiarity with AI editing features, auto-captions, text animations



Hours / Budget



???? Up to $400/month

???? Part-time, weekly deliverables

? Targets: average 4‚Äì8 reels / month based on workflow



How to Apply



Please include:



3 short-form videos you edited that best match retention-style editing



Tell us:



Do you use CapCut Pro?



If yes, since when?



What features do you use most (AI, transitions, captions, templates)?



Your availability (MST overlap hours)



Monthly capacity for reels and turnaround



A brief comment on how you study and replicate brand style



Applications that don‚Äôt answer these points will not be reviewed.



???? Upwork ‚ÄúWhat Not to Include‚Äù Compliant



You will not include:



? Personal contact info

? Full URLs to private portfolios gated by login

? Any pricing outside of Upwork system

? Emotional language or guarantees (‚Äúunlimited revisions‚Äù)



We‚Äôre strictly professional, direct, and structured ‚Äî perfect for creatives and freelancers who appreciate clarity.

title: Fundraising Campaign Manager/Graphics Designer
description:
Gride Technology is seeking a highly creative and results-driven Fundraising Campaign Manager / Graphics Designer to lead the planning, design, execution, and management of digital fundraising campaigns. This role combines strategic fundraising expertise with professional graphic design and video production skills to create compelling campaigns that attract donors, investors, and supporters.

The ideal candidate has proven experience managing fundraising campaigns for non-profit and for-profit organizations, particularly on crowdfunding platforms such as Indiegogo and Kickstarter, and is capable of producing high-quality visual and multimedia content that drives engagement and conversions.



Key Responsibilities

Fundraising Campaign Strategy & Management

‚Ä¢ Plan, develop, and manage end-to-end crowdfunding campaigns.

‚Ä¢ Design campaign structures, goals, timelines, and reward strategies.

‚Ä¢ Create compelling fundraising narratives and value propositions.

‚Ä¢ Monitor campaign performance and optimize conversion strategies.

‚Ä¢ Coordinate campaign launches, updates, and promotional activities.

‚Ä¢ Analyze fundraising metrics and produce performance reports.



Graphic Design & Visual Content Production

‚Ä¢ Design campaign pages, promotional materials, and branding assets.

‚Ä¢ Produce professional graphics for digital marketing, social media, and presentations.

‚Ä¢ Create visual storytelling content that supports fundraising messaging.

‚Ä¢ Ensure brand consistency across all visual communication channels.



Video Production & Editing

‚Ä¢ Produce and edit promotional videos for fundraising campaigns.

‚Ä¢ Develop campaign introduction videos, testimonials, and updates.

‚Ä¢ Optimize video content for online platforms and audience engagement.



Digital Marketing & Campaign Promotion

‚Ä¢ Support campaign visibility through coordinated digital marketing efforts.

‚Ä¢ Collaborate with marketing teams on content distribution strategies.

‚Ä¢ Assist with audience targeting and engagement initiatives.



Portfolio & Project Management

‚Ä¢ Maintain and present a professional portfolio of completed campaigns.

‚Ä¢ Manage project timelines, deliverables, and campaign documentation.

‚Ä¢ Coordinate with internal teams, partners, and external contributors.



Qualifications & Experience

‚Ä¢ Minimum 2 years of professional experience managing fundraising campaigns.

‚Ä¢ Demonstrated success with crowdfunding campaigns for non-profit and/or for-profit organizations.

‚Ä¢ Proven experience managing campaign portfolios.

‚Ä¢ Strong graphic design expertise (branding, digital media, promotional materials).

‚Ä¢ Professional video editing and multimedia production skills.

‚Ä¢ Experience developing campaign storytelling and donor engagement strategies.

‚Ä¢ Knowledge of digital marketing principles and campaign analytics.

‚Ä¢ Strong organizational and project management skills.

‚Ä¢ Excellent communication and presentation abilities.



Technical Skills

‚Ä¢ Graphic design software (Adobe Creative Suite or equivalent).

‚Ä¢ Video editing tools (Premiere Pro, Final Cut, or similar).

‚Ä¢ Campaign analytics and reporting tools.

‚Ä¢ Digital content management platforms.



Preferred Qualifications

‚Ä¢ Experience with investor or community fundraising initiatives.

‚Ä¢ Experience in startup, technology, or growth-stage environments.

‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of donor psychology and conversion strategies.



Key Competencies

‚Ä¢ Creativity and visual storytelling excellence

‚Ä¢ Strategic thinking and execution discipline

‚Ä¢ Results-driven campaign management

‚Ä¢ Attention to detail and brand consistency

‚Ä¢ Ability to meet deadlines in fast-paced environments
